home.title: Welcome
home.ingress: Finally! the cows are out grazing in the cyber pasture, once again
home.body: Here you will find pictures and information about all our cows. The cows sorted under their respective lineage and the bulls in some obscure order. The page gets a little boring without pictures ... While waiting for our photos, you get random professional photos.
home.body2: The farm is run by the Frostmark family. It is located in VÃ¤rmland, just north of Karlstad. The main goal is to breed animals of the French cattle breed limousine.
home.body3: And what characterizes good breeding? Strong legs? Nice feet? High growth? Regardless, it all starts with happy, kind and safe animals :)

homeTech.title: Hello world!
homeTech.body: Find out more on GitHub (its in the footer)
